description: Abraham perparing to sacrifice his son; cherub above and behind gesturing; in a landscape

Signature, Title, Date, and Inscription

Below image in black: Gemalt von Andres Vannuchi, gen del Sarte   Lithographert von G. Wolf in Dresden 1841 / DAS OPFER ABRAHAM\'S. / (Dresdener Galerie) / 67 | on sheet in pencil: 2-363
title: Abraham's  Sacrifice
